Package org.twelve.usecases.system

Class CityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.twelve.usecases.system.CityManager
  • public class CityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all cities in the program, and provides abilities to get city info, add cities, and change cities for an account.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CityManager​(CitiesGateway citiesGateway, AccountRepository accountRepository)
      Constructor for cityManager which stores a cityGateway.

    • Method Summary

      Adds the given city and city id to local storage.

      Change the location of an account.
      void createCity​(java.lang.String cityName)
      Creates a city with the given city name and updates it to the gateway and local storage.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllCities()
      Returns a list of all the cities.
      java.lang.String getLocationOfAccount​(int accountID)
      Get the location where an account is located.
      void switchToDemoMode​(CitiesGateway citiesGateway)
      Switch cities gateway to a demo mode gateway.
      void switchToNormalMode​(CitiesGateway citiesGateway)

      • changeAccountLocation

        public void changeAccountLocation​(int accountID,
                                  java.lang.String newCity)
        Change the location of an account. If the city does not exist in the system, create a new city.
        Parameters:
        accountID - An account id
        newCity - The new city of the account

      • createCity

        Creates a city with the given city name and updates it to the gateway and local storage.
        Parameters:
